    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageDialog

        public MessageDialog()
              throws java.awt.HeadlessException
        Creates an empty, non-modal info message dialog with the active mainframe as owner and OK + CANCEL buttons.
        Throws:
        java.awt.HeadlessException

      • MessageDialog

        public MessageDialog(java.awt.Window owner,
                     int dialogType,
                     boolean modal)
              throws java.awt.HeadlessException
        Creates an empty info message dialog of the given dialog type and modality.
        Parameters:
        owner - Window the parent window (Dialog or Frame); may be null
        dlgType - int, dialog type declares standard buttons used (values from class DialogButtonBar, use DialogButtonBar.BUTTONLESS for void button bar)
        modal - boolean, whether this dialog is operating modal
        Throws:
        java.awt.HeadlessException

      • MessageDialog

        public MessageDialog(java.awt.Window owner,
                     java.lang.Object text,
                     MessageDialog.MessageType msgType,
                     int dlgType,
                     boolean modal)
              throws java.awt.HeadlessException
        Creates a message dialog with given content and settings.
        Parameters:
        owner - Window the parent window (Dialog or Frame); may be null
        text - Object the text content; may be null
        msgType - MessageType determines display outfit (e.g. icon)
        dlgType - int, dialog type declares standard buttons used (values from class DialogButtonBar, use DialogButtonBar.BUTTONLESS for void button bar)
        modal - boolean, whether this dialog is operating modal
        Throws:
        java.awt.HeadlessException

      • MessageDialog

        public MessageDialog(java.awt.Window owner,
                     java.lang.Object text)
              throws java.awt.HeadlessException
        Creates a modal info message dialog with OK_BUTTON and the given text content.
        Parameters:
        owner - Window the parent window (Dialog or Frame); may be null
        text - Object the text content (String or Component); may be null
        Throws:
        java.awt.HeadlessException

        type - MessageType layout appearance
        Returns:

      • createMessageTextLabel

        public static javax.swing.JLabel createMessageTextLabel(java.lang.String text)

      • showInfoMessage

        public static void showInfoMessage(java.awt.Component parent,
                                   java.lang.String title,
                                   java.lang.Object text,
                                   MessageDialog.MessageType type)
        Displays a simple modal info message that the user can click away through "Ok" button. Display is guaranteed to run on the EDT. The calling thread blocks until user input is available or the thread is interrupted.
        Parameters:
        parent - Component the component this message's display is related to; may be null
        title - String dialog title; may be null
        text - Object text to display (Component or String)
        type - MessageType appearance quality

      • showConfirmMessage

        public static boolean showConfirmMessage(java.awt.Component parent,
                                         java.lang.String title,
                                         java.lang.Object text,
                                         int dlgType)
        Displays a modal question message which the user can answer with "Yes" or "No". Display is guaranteed to run on the EDT. The calling thread blocks until user input is available or the thread is interrupted.
        Parameters:
        parent - Component the component this message's display is related to; may be null
        title - String dialog title; may be null
        text - Object text to display (Component or String)
        dlgType - int dialog type, one of DialogButtonBar.YES_NO_BUTTON, DialogButtonBar.OK_CANCEL_BUTTON
        Returns:
        boolean true == "Yes" (confirmed), false == "No" (rejected/unanswered)

      • showMessage

        public static boolean[] showMessage(java.awt.Component parent,
                                    java.lang.String title,
                                    java.lang.Object text,
                                    MessageDialog.MessageType msgType,
                                    int dlgType)
        Displays a modal message box with user interaction as designed by given parameters. Display is guaranteed to run on the EDT. The calling thread blocks until user input is available or the thread is interrupted.
        Parameters:
        parent - Component the component this message's display is related to; may be null
        title - String dialog title; may be null or a code
        text - Object text to display (Component or String)
        type - MessageType appearance quality
        dlgType - int dialog type for button setup (see DialogButtonBar)
        Returns:
        boolean[] with values indicating what action was taken to terminate the dialog: 0 = confirmed, 1 = Cancel, 2 = No, 3 = Escape
